public class ConnMgrImpl

Represents a default implementation of the EllaScript core object ConnMgr.

getSlot

public Obj getSlot(Context ctx,
                   Obj key)
Overrides the method from superclass to return a proxy for all slots not found directly in this object's slots property. The proxy forwards all calls to the active connection object. NOTE: Currently only method calls can be forwarded - forwarding property accesses does not work.

Specified by:
getSlot in interface Obj
Overrides:
getSlot in class AbstractObj
Parameters:
ctx - the current execution context
key - the slot to retrieve
Returns:
the slot's value or a proxy to the active connection
